PRIVACY POLICY

THIS PRIVACY POLICY EXPLAINS HOW WE COLLECT, USE, DISCLOSE, AND SAFEGUARD YOUR INFORMATION WHEN YOU VISIT OUR WEBSITE. BY USING OUR WEBSITE, YOU AGREE TO THE COLLECTION AND USE OF INFORMATION IN ACCORDANCE WITH THIS POLICY.

We may collect the following types of information:

Personal Data:
Name, email address, phone number, and physical address.
Technical Data:
IP address, device type, browser information, and time of access.
Payment Data:
Payment system details (note: we do not store credit card information on our website).

We use your data for the following purposes:

To process your orders and payments.
- To communicate with you regarding your bookings or inquiries. - To improve our website and services. - To comply with legal obligations

We implement the following measures to protect your data:

- SSL/TLS encryption for secure data transmission. - Access to personal data is restricted to authorized personnel only. - Stored data is encrypted to prevent unauthorized access.

Cookies Policy:

We use cookies to enhance user experience, analyze website traffic, and improve our services. You can disable cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect website functionality

Your Rights:

- You have the right to request a copy of your personal data. - You can ask us to delete or correct your data. - You can withdraw your consent for data processing at any time.

Data transfer:

We may share your data with third parties, such as payment processors,
only for the purpose of fulfilling your orders. We do not sell or share your
data for marketing purposes.

Changes to PrivacyPolicy:

We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. Users
will be notified of significant changes via email or through a notice
on our website.

IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS REGARDING THIS PRIVACY POLICY, PLEASE CONTACT US:

eragon.bike@gmail.com Phone: +1 (236) 865 2913

Monthly Subscription

1. Deposit Payment: You need to pay a deposit of $200 CAD. This deposit secures your bike reservation and covers any potential damages. The deposit will be fully refunded if the bike is returned in good condition.

2. Monthly Subscription: After the deposit, you will set up a monthly subscription of $300 CAD, which can be canceled at any time. The subscription guarantees continuous access to your rental bike and maintenance services.
